blocks.heading: Become a Volunteer
blocks.content:
Our volunteers are the heart of Horizon. Whether you have a few hours a month or want to commit to a regular schedule, we have opportunities that fit your availability.

Current opportunities include:

  • Youth mentors (8-week commitment)
  • Event volunteers (one-time)
  • Administrative support (ongoing)
  • Skills-based volunteering (project-based)

blocks.heading: Corporate Partnerships
blocks.content:
We partner with local businesses and corporations to create meaningful community impact. Partnership opportunities include:

Program Sponsorship: Support a specific program like Youth Leadership or Digital Skills training.

Event Sponsorship: Put your brand in front of community members at our annual events.

Employee Engagement: Organize volunteer days for your team.

In-Kind Donations: Provide goods, services, or expertise to support our work.
